welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kobe, a city known for its beautiful harbor, delicious Kobe beef, and stunning mountain views. We hope you enjoy your time here and explore all that this charming city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kobe Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kobe Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Itami Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights operated by low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network by selecting 'ITM Free Wi-Fi' from the available networks and following the prompts.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kansai International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kansai International Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network by selecting 'KIX Free Wi-Fi' on their device and accepting the terms and conditions.
